data.actual_result: This modal is more spacious there as compared to other modals.
data.expected_result: The spacing is like all other similar modals.
data.short_description: The delete channel modal has large space at the bottom where the delete and the cancel button sit (as compared to other modals).
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the 3 dots on the top right side of a channel in a server in which you have manage channels permission. - Click on channel settings>3 dots on top right side>Delete channel. - Observe the place where the delete and cancel button sit.
